name: mummy

effect.scarlet-violet: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.the-teal-mask: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy. multitype is unaffected. If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

short_effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.
